document.full_text: a federal judge ruled jared l. loughner not mentally competent to stand trial on charges that he opened fire at a constituent event for an arizona congresswoman in january, killing six.
document.title: suspect in shooting of giffords ruled unfit for trial
lines_and_colors: a federal judge ruled jared l. loughner not mentally competent to stand trial on charges that he opened fire at a constituent event for an arizona congresswoman in january, killing six.
